bilingual.source: Derek's room is a bit bigger than Beibei's.
bilingual.target: 德里克的房间比贝贝的房间要大一点儿。

list.abstract: room（英[ruːm]，美[ruːm]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为空间；地盘；房间。作动词时，释义为同住一套房间；居住；住宿。短语搭配为living room（客厅）。例句为“Book a room with a kitchen.（预订一间带厨房的房间。）” room的复数为rooms，现在分词为rooming，过去分词为roomed。其名词性近义词有apartment、opportunity、scope，不及物动词近义词有belong、harbor、live。

yingyinNormal.en: Ma, say bye-bye to Room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，和房间说拜拜吧。

yingyinNormal.en: They kept your room for a while.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们也保留你房间有一阵子。

yingyinNormal.en: We all win. Look how tidy the room is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都赢了。看看房间现在有多干净。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's that. The room's compromised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事情只能这样了，这个房间已经被污染了。

yingyinNormal.en: And make sure our room isn't next to theirs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有确定我们的房间，不要在他们的隔壁。

yingyinNormal.en: And so will you, because this is your room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也会的，因为这个... 这是你的房间。

yingyinNormal.en: Seriously? Yeah. You did it right in the room?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？是的，你在房间里就做好决定了？

yingyinNormal.en: We all win. Look how tidy the room is. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都赢了。看看房间现在有多干净。好棒。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Elizabeth, let us take a turn about the room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伊丽莎白小姐，我们在房间里瞎走动走动吧。

yingyinNormal.en: What a superbly featured room and what excellent boiled potatoes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多漂亮的房间啊，多漂亮的土豆啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, George, you're staying in my room tonight. Oh, goodie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，乔治，你们今天晚上在我房间睡。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's Ma right now? Room. What room? Jack, where's this room?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你妈妈现在在哪？房间里。什么房间？杰克，那房间在哪？

yingyinNormal.en: The dinosaur room is George's favorite room. My favorite room is the king and queen's room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这间恐龙屋，是乔治最喜欢的房间。我最喜欢的是皇帝和皇后的那间房间。

yingyinNormal.en: And it looks as if Daddy Pig is already in his favorite room. Which room is that, Mummy? The room with the cakes in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来爸爸已经去他自己最喜欢的房间了。那是什么房间，妈妈？有很多蛋糕的房间。

yingyinNormal.en: And you can search one door and one room and another door and another room and the third door the third room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以点击这一扇门进入这个房间，也可以点另一扇门进另一个房间，或者第三扇门和房间。

yingyinNormal.en: Your room, Jack. What's outside the room? Space. No, the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关于你的房间，杰克，房间外面有什么？太空，不，是世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this Room? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是那房间吗？对。

yingyinNormal.en: Every time you click in one door and one room, the doors to the other room shrunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次你点击一扇门进入一个房间，另外两个房间的门就会缩小。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Go to that room over there. Wait with the others. I'll call you. That. That room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，去那个房间。跟别人一起等。我会叫你。那个，那个房间。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not me, I swear. You were in your hotel room taking a nap? Yes, I was in my hotel room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是我，我发誓。你在你的酒店房间里小憩？是的，我待在酒店房间。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 房间; 提供住宿; 住宿

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 卧室；寝室；与两性关系有关的；房事的；城郊住宅区

word_family.mean: n. 空间；地盘；房间；室；机会；范围；房间里的人；寓所；余地；一套房间

sense_info_list.en: a divided part of the inside of a building
sense_info_list.zh: 房间; 提供住宿; 住宿

examination_example.sentence: The dominance of television was not confined to our living <highlight>rooms</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视的主导地位并不局限于我们的客厅。

examination_example.sentence: She examined the books housed in the kindergarten <highlight>rooms</highlight> of four day-care centers in Western Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她检查了存放在西澳大利亚四个日托中心的幼儿园房间里的书籍。

examination_example.sentence: Three holes are in the locations of the spire, the main hall and the upper <highlight>rooms</highlight> to the north of the central aisle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三个孔分别位于塔尖、主厅和中央通道北部的上层房间。

examination_example.sentence: A restaurant named "Number 4" contacted Joe's teacher to ask if the 9-year-old could come and decorate its dining-<highlight>room</highlight> with his drawings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家名为“4号”的餐馆联系了乔的老师，询问这位9岁的孩子是否可以用他的画来装饰餐厅。

examination_example.sentence: Jonathan and I are thinking of renovating our sitting <highlight>room</highlight>, not the whole house, not yet anyway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔纳森和我正在考虑翻新我们的客厅，而不是整栋房子，至少现在还没有。

examination_example.sentence: Signs barring cell-phone use are a familiar sight to anyone who has ever sat in a hospital waiting <highlight>room</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止使用手机的标志对任何在医院候诊室里坐过的人来说都是一个熟悉的景色。

examination_example.sentence: Fostering 21st-century skills may be as simple as giving kids <highlight>room</highlight> to play, tinker and try things out, even as they grow older.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 培养21世纪的技能可能就像给孩子们玩耍，摆弄和尝试的空间一样简单，即使当他们长大了。
他们有很大的改进空间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Keep the <highlight>room</highlight> cool rather than warm to avoid feeling sleepy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持房间凉爽而不是温暖，以免感到困倦。

examination_example.sentence: Three days ago, the light in our living <highlight>room</highlight> suddenly went out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三天前，我们客厅的灯突然熄灭了。

examination_example.sentence: We'd come down in the morning to find they'd turned the <highlight>room</highlight> upside down, and left it looking like a zoo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们早上下来，发现他们把房间弄得乱七八糟，看起来像个动物园。

精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The wallpaper with cartoon patterns is ideal for my son's <highlight>room</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次一大群人来，她都会退后一步，把自己锁在一个房间里。
哦，你的房间太脏了，迈克！

examination_example.sentence: Every time a great crowd come, she steps back and locks herself up in a <highlight>room</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次一大群人来，她都会退后一步，把自己锁在一个房间里。

word_usage.usage: room作“房间”讲时是可数名词，作“空间”讲时是不可数名词。
